title: IPHONE 12 64GB PURPLE
description:
Мобилен телефон
iOS 14.1
IP68 водоотпорен ( до 6м за 30 мин)
Екран:6.1" Super Retina XDR OLED, HDR10
Резолуција:1170 x 2532 pixels
Chipset:Apple A14 Bionic (5 nm)
CPU:Hexa-core
GPU:Apple GPU (4-core graphics)
Интерна меморија:64GB, RAM 4GB
Примарна камера:
12 MP, f/1.6, 26mm (wide), 1.4µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS
12 MP, f/2.4, 120˚, 13mm (ultrawide), 1/3.6"
Секундарна камера:
12 MP, f/2.2, 23mm (wide), 1/3.6"
SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor)
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band, hotspot
Bluetooth 5.0, A2DP, LE
GPS with A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS
Fast charging 20W, 50% in 30 min (advertised)
USB Power Delivery 2.0
Face ID,Barometer,Three‑axis gyro,Accelerometer,Proximity sensor,Ambient light sensor
MagSafe wireless charging up to 15W**
Qi wireless charging up to 7.5W**
Батерија:Li-Ion
